import React, {useState}from "react"; import closeimg from "../images/06.Contacto/x.png"; require("typeface-poppins"); require("typeface-rubik"); function ContactModal({ close, modal }) { const [mensaje, setMensaje] = useState({ subject: '', from_email: '', message: '' }) const handleChange=(event)=>{ setMensaje({ ...mensaje, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } return ( <>
{/*content*/}

); } export default ContactModal;
